title: Nutrients in an aquatic ecosystem SM4

content.question: Which of the following was most likely a direct consequence of the addition of phosphate to the lake?

choices.label: The amount of biomass in the first trophic level decreased.
The amount of biomass in the second trophic level decreased.
The amount of energy available to producers in the lake increased.
The amount of energy available to consumers in the lake increased.

content.answer: The amount of energy available to consumers in the lake increased.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
